LanguageData.VFEE.ReleaseAllVassals.Confirm: Releasing vassals will causes resources stored to be lost. Are you sure?
LanguageData.VFEE.TitheDesc: Tithes will be delivered via drop-pods after designated time has elapsed.
LanguageData.VFEE.VassalDesc: You can only vassalize bases that are less than 100 tiles away from you or your vassals\nVassalize more towns to increase the reach and unlock more potential vassal subjects
LanguageData.VFEE.Honors.Active: These honors are active on your noble. Drag them to the right to remove them from this character.
LanguageData.VFEE.Honors.Available: These honors are available to be equipped on your nobles. Drag them to the left to activate them on the chosen noble.
LanguageData.VFEE.Honors.Reward: you will gain the honor {0} to assign to a colonist
LanguageData.VFEE.Honor.Pending: This must be bestowed in a ceremony before it will become active.
LanguageData.VFEE.Honor.Bestow.Desc: Bestow pending honors for this noble. Will give the following honors:\n{0}
LanguageData.VFEE.Honor.Bestow.Success: {0} has been bestowed with their pending honors. They have gained:\n{0}
LanguageData.VFEE.Honor.NoHonors: Must have pending honors to bestow.
LanguageData.VFEE.ForcedFaction.Empire.CannotDisable: {FACTION} cannot be disabled as it's required by Vanilla Factions Expanded - Empire.
LanguageData.VFEE.ForcedFaction.Empire.FactionDiscove: {FACTION} must be added to the game as it's require by Vanilla Factions Expanded - Empire.
LanguageData.VFEE.ForcedFaction.Deserters.CannotDisab: {FACTION} cannot be disabled as it's required by Vanilla Factions Expanded - Deserters.
